==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], this book contained [[Invisibility]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], this book contained [[Passage of Golubria]] and [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]].
*Prior to [[0.26]], this book contained [[Darkness]].
*Prior to [[0.15]], this book contained [[Apportation]] instead of [[Invisibility]].
*Prior to [[0.12]], this book contained [[Control Teleport]].
*Prior to [[0.8]], this book did not contain Passage of Golubria or Darkness.
